hero.name: Aleksei
hero.description1: I strive to create software that is
hero.description2: accessible, efficient, and enjoyable for all users

about.passionateDeveloper: Passionate Frontend Developer specializing in React, Redux, CSS/Sass, and HTML. I excel at crafting user-focused software with an emphasis on clean design and interactivity. A strong team player, I thrive on unraveling complex problems. My experience extends to Node.js and PostgreSQL. I champion effective UI as the bridge between users and applications, ensuring a seamless, responsive experience through sharp visuals and intuitive design.

work.introduction: What I have done so far

experience.point1: Built interactive web applications, emphasizing user engagement and functionality.
experience.point2: Designed and implemented user experiences, aligning interactivity and data structures with business requirements.
experience.point3: Utilized a diverse technical stack, including HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, Material UI, Ant Design, JavaScript, React, Redux, Tailwind, Three.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
experience.point4: Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design, providing seamless user experiences across all platforms.
experience.company_name2: Golden Vault Financial Consulting Co., Ltd, Shanghai
experience.point5: Communicated with foreign companies for consultancy in business management and entering the Chinese market.
experience.point6: Was responsible for consulting support to Russian companies with business in China.
experience.point7: Efficiently communicated with website engineers, building the English and Russian websites in order to increase internet traffic.
